description.value:
Prerequisite: Air Genasi, Fire Genasi, Water Genasi; Elemental Expression (Earth)

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBladeWard0]{Blade Ward} as a Bonus Action a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, regaining all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

At 5th level, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPassWithou]{Pass Without Trace} with this bullet once per Long Rest. Once you cast Pass Without Trace using this bullet, you can cast it again using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells when you cast them with this trait (choose when you select this species).

These spells do not require spell components when you cast them with this trait.
